import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Header } from './Header' import bg from '../Img/Tariff/bg.png' import { Form } from './Form' import { TariffForm } from './TariffForm' import { Slider, createTheme} from '@mui/material' import ask from '../Img/Tariff/ask.png' import arrow from '../Img/Tariff/arrow.png' import something from '../Img/Tariff/something.png' export const Tariff = () => { const totalPrice = 10746 const pricePerMonth = 1791 const prevPrice = 11940 const [profitTen, setProfitTen] = useState(10) const [profitFifteen, setProfitFifteen] = useState(15) const [profitTwenty, setProfitTwenty] = useState(20) const [sliderValue, setSliderValue] = useState(1) const [monthCase, setMonthCase] = useState('') const [isProfit, setIsProfit] = useState(false) // ЛОГИКА ДЛЯ ДИНАМИЧЕСКОГО ИЗМЕНЕНИЯ КОНТЕНТА В ЗАВИСИМОСТИ ОТ ПОЛОЖЕНИЯ СЛАЙДЕРА useEffect(()=>{ if(sliderValue === 1 || sliderValue === 21){ setMonthCase('месяц') } else if(sliderValue === 2 || sliderValue === 3 || sliderValue === 4 || sliderValue === 22 || sliderValue === 23 || sliderValue === 24){ setMonthCase('месяца') } else{ setMonthCase('месяцев') } },[sliderValue]) // Маркеры для слайдера const mark = [ { value:1, label: '1 мес.' }, { value:6, label: '6 мес.' }, { value:12, label: '12 мес.' }, { value:24, label: '24 мес.' }, ] const theme = createTheme({ palette: { primary: { main: '#FF8845', }, }, }); return ( <>
